message.content: This question requires basic knowledge about observing small objects. Tiny nits, which are lice eggs, can be difficult to see with the naked eye. To see them best, one would need to use a vision enhancing aid such as a magnifying glass or microscope. Option (B) is incorrect because a series of mirrors would not enhance vision, but rather provide a different angle to view the object. Option (C) is also incorrect because a toothpick would not enhance vision but could potentially be used to pick out nits. Option (D) is not a commonly used aid for enhancing vision.

Option (D) is incorrect because a glass eye is an artificial eye and would not aid in seeing tiny nits.
